# preferredInput

**Instance Property**

The preferred input port for audio routing.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredInput: AVAudioSessionPortDescription? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property indicates the input port selected using the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/setPreferredInput(_:)] method. To see the actual current input port, use the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/currentRoute] property. This property returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0] if you haven’t set a preference or if the previously set preferred input is no longer available.

## Configuring inputs

- **isInputAvailable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an audio input path is available.
- **availableInputs**: An array of input ports available for audio routing.
- **setPreferredInput(_:)**: Sets the preferred input port for audio routing.
- **inputDataSource**: The currently selected input data source.
- **inputDataSources**: An array of available data sources for the audio session’s current input port.
- **setInputDataSource(_:)**: Selects a data source for the audio session’s current input port.
- **availableInputsChangeNotification**
